verses.verse: חָ֭כְמוֹת <WH2454> Cha-che-mot Wisdom בָּנְתָ֣ה <WH1129> ba-ne-Tah hath builded בֵיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> vei-Tah; her house חָצְבָ֖ה <WH2672> cha-tze-Vah she hath hewn out עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ <WH5982> 'am-mu-Dei-ha pillars שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> shiv-'Ah. her seven

טָבְחָ֣ה <WH2873> ta-ve-Chah She hath killed טִ֭בְחָהּ <WH2874> Tiv-chah her beasts מָסְכָ֣ה <WH4537> ma-se-Chah she hath mingled יֵינָ֑הּ <WH3196> yei-Nah; her wine אַ֝֗ף <WH637> 'Af, has also עָֽרְכָ֥ה <WH6186> 'a-re-Chah she hath also furnished שֻׁלְחָנָֽהּ׃ <WH7979> shul-cha-Nah. her table

שָֽׁלְחָ֣ה <WH7971> sha-le-Chah She hath sent forth נַעֲרֹתֶ֣יהָ <WH5291> na-'a-ro-Tei-ha her maidens תִקְרָ֑א <WH7121> tik-Ra; she crieth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- From גַּ֝פֵּ֗י <WH1610> gap-Pei, upon מְרֹ֣מֵי <WH4791> me-Ro-mei the highest places קָֽרֶת׃ <WH7176> Ka-ret. of the city

מִי־ <WH4310> mi- Whoever פֶ֭תִי <WH6612> Fe-ti Whoso [is] simple יָסֻ֣ר <WH5493> ya-Sur let him turn in הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> Hen-nah; here חֲסַר־ <WH2638> cha-sar- hither [as for] him that wanteth לֵ֝֗ב <WH3820> Lev, understanding אָ֣מְרָה <WH559> 'A-me-rah she saith לּֽוֹ׃ lo.

לְ֭כוּ <WH1980> Le-chu Come לַחֲמ֣וּ <WH3898> la-cha-Mu eat בְֽלַחֲמִ֑י <WH3899> ve-la-cha-Mi; of my bread וּ֝שְׁת֗וּ <WH8354> u-she-Tu, and drink בְּיַ֣יִן <WH3196> be-Ya-yin of the wine מָסָֽכְתִּי׃ <WH4537> ma-Sa-che-ti. [which] I have mingled

עִזְב֣וּ <WH5800> 'iz-Vu Forsake פְתָאיִ֣ם <WH6612> fe-ta-Yim the foolish וִֽחְי֑וּ <WH2421> vich-Yu; and live וְ֝אִשְׁר֗וּ <WH833> ve-'ish-Ru, and go בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> be-De-rech in the way בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> bi-Nah. of understanding

יֹ֤סֵ֨ר׀ <WH3256> yo-Ser He that reproveth לֵ֗ץ <WH3887> Letz, a scorner לֹקֵ֣חַֽ <WH3947> lo-Ke-ach getteth ל֣וֹ lo קָל֑וֹן <WH7036> ka-Lon; to himself shame וּמוֹכִ֖יחַ <WH3198> u-mo-Chi-ach and he that rebuketh לְרָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> le-ra-Sha' a wicked מוּמֽוֹ׃ <WH3971> mu-Mo. [man getteth] himself a blot

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תּ֣וֹכַח <WH3198> To-chach Reprove לֵ֭ץ <WH3887> letz not a scorner פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- or יִשְׂנָאֶ֑ךָּ <WH8130> yis-na-'E-ka; lest he hate הוֹכַ֥ח <WH3198> ho-Chach thee rebuke לְ֝חָכָ֗ם <WH2450> le-cha-Cham, a wise man וְיֶאֱהָבֶֽךָּ׃ <WH157> ve-ye-'e-ha-Ve-ka. and he will love

תֵּ֣ן <WH5414> ten Give לְ֭חָכָם <WH2450> Le-cha-chom [instruction] to a wise וְיֶחְכַּם־ <WH2449> ve-yech-kam- [man] and he will be yet wiser ע֑וֹד <WH5750> od; will be still הוֹדַ֥ע <WH3045> ho-Da' teach לְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <WH6662> le-tzad-Dik, a just וְי֣וֹסֶף <WH3254> ve-Yo-sef [man] and he will increase לֶֽקַח׃ <WH3948> Le-kach. in learning פ Peh

תְּחִלַּ֣ת <WH8462> te-chil-Lat [is] the beginning חָ֭כְמָה <WH2451> choch-mah of wisdom יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> yir-'At The fear יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; God וְדַ֖עַת <WH1847> ve-Da-'at and the knowledge קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <WH6918> ke-do-Shim of the holy בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> bi-Nah. [is] understanding

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for בִ֭י vi יִרְבּ֣וּ <WH7235> yir-Bu shall be multiplied יָמֶ֑יךָ <WH3117> ya-Mei-cha; For by me thy days וְיוֹסִ֥יפוּ <WH3254> ve-yo-Si-fu shall be increased לְּ֝ךָ֗ le-cha, שְׁנ֣וֹת <WH8141> she-Not and the years חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> chai-Yim. of thy life

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If חָ֭כַמְתָּ <WH2449> Cha-cham-ta If thou be wise חָכַ֣מְתָּ <WH2449> cha-Cham-ta thou shalt be wise לָּ֑ךְ Lach; וְ֝לַ֗צְתָּ <WH3887> ve-Latz-ta, for thyself but [if] thou scornest לְֽבַדְּךָ֥ <WH905> le-vad-de-Cha alone תִשָּֽׂא׃ <WH5375> tis-Sa. thou alone shalt bear

אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> 'E-shet woman כְּ֭סִילוּת <WH3687> Ke-si-lut A foolish הֹֽמִיָּ֑ה <WH1993> ho-mi-Yah; [is] clamorous פְּ֝תַיּ֗וּת <WH6615> pe-tai-Yut, [she is] simple וּבַל־ <WH1077> u-val- and יָ֥דְעָה <WH3045> Ya-de-'ah knoweth מָּֽה׃ <WH4100> Mah. nothing

וְֽ֭יָשְׁבָה <WH3427> Ve-ya-she-vah For she sitteth לְפֶ֣תַח <WH6607> le-Fe-tach at the door בֵּיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> bei-Tah; of her house עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on כִּ֝סֵּ֗א <WH3678> kis-Se, on a seat מְרֹ֣מֵי <WH4791> me-Ro-mei in the high places קָֽרֶת׃ <WH7176> Ka-ret. of the city

לִקְרֹ֥א <WH7121> lik-Ro To call לְעֹֽבְרֵי־ <WH5674> le-'oe-rei- pass דָ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> Da-rech; Who הַֽ֝מְיַשְּׁרִ֗ים <WH3474> ham-yash-she-Rim, who go right אֹֽרְחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH734> O-re-cho-Tam. on their ways

מִי־ <WH4310> mi- Whoever פֶ֭תִי <WH6612> Fe-ti Whoso [is] simple יָסֻ֣ר <WH5493> ya-Sur let him turn in הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> Hen-nah; here וַחֲסַר־ <WH2638> va-cha-sar- hither and [as for] him that wanteth לֵ֝֗ב <WH3820> Lev, understanding וְאָ֣מְרָה <WH559> ve-'A-me-rah she saith לּֽוֹ׃ lo.

מַֽיִם־ <WH4325> ma-yim- waters גְּנוּבִ֥ים <WH1589> ge-nu-Vim Stolen יִמְתָּ֑קוּ <WH4985> yim-Ta-ku; are sweet וְלֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> ve-Le-chem and bread סְתָרִ֣ים <WH5643> se-ta-Rim [eaten] in secret יִנְעָֽם׃ <WH5276> yin-'Am. is pleasant

וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- does not יָ֭דַע <WH3045> Ya-da' But he knoweth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that רְפָאִ֣ים <WH7496> re-fa-'Im not that the dead שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> Sham; are there בְּעִמְקֵ֖י <WH6012> be-'im-Kei [are] in the depths שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> she-'ol of hell קְרֻאֶֽיהָ׃ <WH7121> ke-ru-'Ei-ha. [are] there [and that] her guests פ Peh
